website_summaries.verdict: A better choice than Superstar for sports or an active child.
pros: Comes in clear gray/shock pink, pink/white/vivid berry, black/silver/red, blue/white/royal and grey/yellow/black
Synthetic upper with breathable perforations, lace-up closure, EcoOrthoLite sockliner
cons: Not as cushioned as other styles

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you check and double check the sizes
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about the fit but the ordering was a bit confusing. There are three boxes so I chose toddler (my son is almost two) and just assumed that the 6.5 m meant in toddlers. Low and behold it really doesn't matter what you choose in the first box because you still need to filter through all the kid, little kid, and then toddler sizes. Honestly it's my fault. I will say though that when I received them and looked in the box they were pretty cute. I obviously sent them back but I'd probably recommend them based on looks alone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh V.

customer_reviews.title: What Matters
customer_reviews.text: We've had these a while ... Kiddo has moved up a shoe size and I'm looking at these shoes in our donation box and thinking about how great they still look ... Size was right-on, they seem comfortable (kiddo didn't want to take them off), and our kiddo didn't destroy them before outgrowing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel good and grippy! Kids wont be slipping around in these.
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved the shoes so it's hard to rate their durability. While I've always been a fan of Adidas footwear, I'm not a fan of the current generation/style of shoes. I'm concerned the Adidas stripes on the sides of these particular shoes are going to peel off. They look and feel chintzy -almost sticker like. The bottoms do feel durable. I think they will hold up well enough with my hard-on-shoes 10 year old son. And they feel pretty grippy which is something I specifucally look for when shoe shopping for my littles! Bonus? My 10 year old thinks the shoes are pretty rad.
customer_reviews.author: Trish J

customer_reviews.title: A real good buy.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, stylish, comfortable sneaker. My son was raving about the sneaker for weeks. How cool it looks and how comfortable they were. Got lots of compliments on it too, which was weird because we always buy inexpensive sneakers. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Publius

customer_reviews.title: Won’t wear any other pair!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and only wants to wear these above all others. I changed out the laces for No Tie laces and bought them on amazon also. Great buy. Update: Bought these a while ago and they still look awesome!! Bought another pair in different size!!
customer_reviews.author: FelissBeShoppin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These kids shoes are comfortable and feature good arch support. They are lightweight and durable. Laces can be switched out with Xpand No Tie Shoelaces for kids who cannot tie their laces. The insole is removable and comes with a useful size/fit guide printed on the insole. Just remove the insole and have the child place their foot over to measure. I highly recommend this shoe for its comfort and value!
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my teenage daughter. No complaints or issues. She wears them constantly and still loves them. Don't seem like they will fall apart the way most of her other sneakers have, but time will tell. Either way though I am satisfied with this purchase. The price was only slightly higher than the shoes I have been getting from the big W place and the quality was a significant improvement. Would not hesitate to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm living in the past, but it seems that these shoes do not hold up anymore. I remember getting one pair of shoes for the school year. Now it seems like I can't go three months without having to buy my kids new shoes. And not because they grow out of them. The entire shoe seems to want to disintegrate. I can't even say that I am not buying a certain brand again for this reason. We've tried them all and the results are the same each each time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ronakov

customer_reviews.title: Not like the photo
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very cute- but they have laces, NOT Velcro. Kinda disappointed, but decided to keep them and starting teaching my son to tie his shoes. I just wish it woulda been in writing somewhere that after a certain size Velcro was not an option. Also, they didn’t come in a box which I thought was weird.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Good looking boy's shoe but Toe is wearing quickly
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing these for about 4 months and overall they still look great. However, the front toe guard (the portion of the sole that extends up the front of the shoe) has worn off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Durham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Amazon find
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, style, my kid loves how light and fresh they are, I keep buying the next size same color same style for as many sizes they have...best shoes for your child money can buy...
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and cool 😎
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were purchased for my nephew. The color was great and the quality was terrific too. My sister said they ended up lasting my nephew almost 6 months of the school year which is a long time for a 5th grader!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scott Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding Adidas this style for my 10 year old son. These fit great, are great quality and he likes this style better than the newer Adidas that are out in stores right now.
customer_reviews.author: jjjacob

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and look really cute on. They fit well and last longer than most kids shoes. Found them for a really good price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: leapinlambchop

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old has some adorable chubby wide feet
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old has some adorable chubby wide feet... I hope he grows into them LOL.. :) finding shoes that fit him is difficult enough but, he's also new to walking/running around... he was a late walker maybe around 15months? These fit him perfect and he is very steady on his chubby cute feet, I just wish I could keep up with him.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Noel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: After returning a pair of Under Armour shoes of 12.5 little girl size as too tight on top of her tiny foot I was afraid to purchase on line again, but try I did. I'm very happy with these shoes watching my daughter run and run and run in them saying, "I love these shoes!".
customer_reviews.author: Satinderpal

customer_reviews.title: He beats his shoes up terribly with all the running around he does on the ...
customer_reviews.text: 8yr old wears these to school! He beats his shoes up terribly with all the running around he does on the playground. They look great and have held up well for his rough abuse on them! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AEW

customer_reviews.title: If you can run faster...
customer_reviews.text: We got this shoes for our 10 year old, he destroys shoes in no time...I'm not sure if this ones will last better...they look nice and comfy. He tried them today to run 2 miles and he thought he was faster...so good!
customer_reviews.author: carmen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality shoe laces and fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 3 year old. The shoe laces will NOT stay tied for nothing. He’s tripped several times from it. Other Adidas shoes do this too I’ve learned, so I won’t be purchasing this brand again. The fit also seems wider than normal. I ordered regular not wide. My son actually had wide feet and they still fit odd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Survivied 2-3 months
customer_reviews.text: It is a soft and comfortable shoe, and survived 2-3 months with my 4th grader. Other shoes also do not survive more. At least this is reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Yavuz

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a month before there were tears in the mesh
customer_reviews.text: I knew they were not going to be long lasting but I did expect them to last longer than a month especially since there was some rain during the month which meant less time wearing them outside. They are still wearable but they look terrible.
customer_reviews.author: mom of c and c

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter to go with a magenta Adidas outfit I got her they are a little different in color and I need to buy black laces so they match the outfit better but they look amazing on her and she loves them thank you for speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson I did order them a half size bigger seem to fit great hoping they hold up well he is very hard sneakers time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Huggler

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad..
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them. There are several places where I can already see the thread un-stitching so I am questioning the quality. For the cost they were reasonable and my kids are hard on shoes so it's probably not a product defect as much as a cost to quality trade-off. Not too bad though.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable. My feet hurt bad.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. My feet hurt bad after a few hours in these.
customer_reviews.author: Holly V. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered toddler sizes 6.5 and 7 and received big kid/adult sizes 6.5 and 7. The listing has clear options for toddler sizing and my order indicates that I ordered toddler sizes. So frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Keller

customer_reviews.title: My kid is usually pretty easy on shoes
customer_reviews.text: My kid is usually pretty easy on shoes. These wore apart within a couple weeks. She is a bit of a sneakerhead so she knows how to take care of something and was disappointed they started to come apart. Pretty cute when they were new tho and the fit was comfortable she said.
customer_reviews.author: Casie

customer_reviews.title: Very purple
customer_reviews.text: These are very "girly". Much more purple than anticipated. Not the greatest for thick toddler feet. A bit difficult to get on and the Velcro straps are pretty short.
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Great for the price. It’s my daughters daily school shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela serrano

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Very comfortable, although keeping a 6yr shoe tied (who can't tie it himself) is hard.
customer_reviews.author: yellowcharger

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: The granddaughter loves them wears the hell out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Carl elder

customer_reviews.title: Good Sneakers at a Fair Price!
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes his new sneakers, the color is nice and vibrant, and they fit well, and the laces are the perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: My 9-year-old loved these immediately
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old loved these immediately. We bought them because, with the reinforced toe, they looked much more durable than the Nikes he has been wearing. That seems true so far, and he finds them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: solid shoes
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They are good for wide feet and seem very well made. My 6 year old son thinks they are cool.
customer_reviews.author: M.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great value
customer_reviews.text: These are a great shoe for the price. They have an actual rubber sole so they are more durable and my daughter says they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: BeccaR

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son, he likes them. Did have a breaking in period he wasn't fond of lol but he loves them now. Only had fo a few months so we'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan M.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes i ever bought for my 9 yr old twins
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have lasted longer than any shoe i bought my 9 year old twins! And they are comfy and fit their tippy toe feet perfect
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice sneakers but seamed a little large. Might have to order half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Will by again
customer_reviews.text: Just an all-around light weight nice shoe. Will buy again when needed
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of adidas sneakers I've purchased for my toddler son. Just like the first pair the quality is great and they are very cute. They are lightweight with good quality Velcro and seem like they will last a long time like his first pair. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: JessLV

customer_reviews.title: They're a Hit!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my grandson. He promised to tie his own shoes if he could have these. He does, and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not like the photo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because of the velcro and when they came they had laces. And they look cheap. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jemma Ray

customer_reviews.title: Coated in Creepy Crusty Crud
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how they fit my son, but i do know that they arrived with some sort of white crud crusted all over them. It mostly came off with water, but I hope there will be no other issues with these shoes. I'm only keeping them because my son's toes are literally hanging out of his current shoes and he needs this pair to get through to the end of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: MegG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe. The white adidas stripes on the side are shiney, didn't expect that but I like it. My son says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew who is in third grade. Fits him a bit big, but kids do grow up quite quickly, Hopefully this pair will last for more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adidas winner
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5y and it was a good buy. He destroys shoes and this held up to my little hulk. Lasted abt 1.5 years before I saw real damage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers for my active 9yr old!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a lightweight yet durable sneaker. This fit the bill. I just ordered these because he outgrew his last pair in this style! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Piombo

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my son's track practice and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's track practice and he hasn't complained about them being uncomfortable and they don't make his feet stink either.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old approves
customer_reviews.text: Cute style and good fit, no complaints from my fairly active daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: great buy!
customer_reviews.text: shoes are good quality and look really nice! there was small grey stain on the shoe lace but other than that no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: lot of sand gets in the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks nice and is very comfortable. But when my son wore it to school and as they play in the ground - everyday we would take out lot of sand from the shoe. Looks like the mesh at the top of the shoe is causing more sand to go inside the shoe. We had to buy a new shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! My 7 year old loves them and says they’re very comfy. Hold up very well and look nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Shoelaces
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great and fit awesome on our 6 yr old. However the shoelaces were damaged and already fraying... Not impressed with receiving a damaged shoelaces.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfortable for my 4 year old. We will probably buy another pair when he grows out of them. We bought them about 6 months ago and they’ve held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Goble

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. And they look great, hopefully they'll last longer than the other ones we bought.
customer_reviews.author: TVSV

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for back to school. They fit well and he loved how the look, but they were really uncomfortable. There is very little padding. After just 2 days is feet were hurting so badly that we had to go back to his old shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Ulanowski

customer_reviews.title: The shoes looks really cute and the color is nice but it is uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had pain the first day she wore it. The shoes looks really cute and the color is nice but it is uncomfortable to wear. We Would return it :(
customer_reviews.author: MJMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for my son!
customer_reviews.text: This is by 7 year old’s first pair of running shoes and they’ve been great. We’ve gone on many runs together now and he seems to like its support.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes. My son usually damages shoes in weeks
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes .My son usually damages shoes in weeks..he loves these and they are standing well
customer_reviews.author: Mikisha Silvera

customer_reviews.title: For little fat toddler feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a 5.5 for my 20 month old. They are the easiest kicks to put on and he loves them! Lightweight and we got them totally soaked at the stomp pad a few days ago, they dried out quickly and kept their shape!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Straps and overall build are very good quality. well worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes, he wears them every day and they are still holding up as if we just bought them. Straps and overall build are very good quality. well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A.H. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. My 9 year old daughter likes them a lot and finds them very comfortable. The shoes got compliments the first day out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like how small rocks get stuck in the tread of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are holding up well to my three year old boy. He is rough on a lot of shoes and these still look new. I don't like how small rocks get stuck in the tread of the shoe, but overall a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are terrible! The first pair we received the fabric on top of the top box started to separate after less than 1 month. Returned as defective...hoping this was just a fluke pair. The second pair we have received are doing the same thing!!! The construct and fabric of these shoes are terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: They didn't hold up well
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are completely destroyed three months after buying. They were nice while they lasted though.
customer_reviews.author: jenna johnston

customer_reviews.title: ... every day for 3 months and they still look great!
customer_reviews.text: When the shoes first came I thought they wouldn't hold up but my 4 year old grandson has wore them about every day for 3 months and they still look great!
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son thinks they are comfortable, so we are good
customer_reviews.author: StormRider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sneakers for my daughter for Tball. She wears a 12 and the 12 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the 6.5 in kids I ordered was huge, larger then my wife's 8w feet.
customer_reviews.author: BigMike

customer_reviews.title: I am deeply disappointed and would not buy them again
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these shoes for less than one month and both shoes got holes in the sides. This has never before happened with a pair of Adidas shoes. Normally they last for a long time. I am deeply disappointed and would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch D Disselkoen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, kid loves the look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son very well, he says they are super comfortable. We have had them several weeks and they are holding up pretty well for a 9 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: NIce Gym shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: These fit my daughter just perfect! She is very happy with the shoes. Great for walking and jogging!
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Look better in the picture..
customer_reviews.text: Very bulky and thick. Returned the shoes. Good for maybe hiking or other outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: MomofToo

customer_reviews.title: very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, light, comfortable, bright, true to size, our son loves wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: GrlRdr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fit as expected. I am confident they will hold up for the school year.
customer_reviews.author: BusyFrugalMom

customer_reviews.title: Not for active child
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this is a boy’s shoe. Not even 2 months in, and it started to rip and my sons foot ripped right out of the shoe. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: H. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size smaller than our usual
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be a half size smaller than usual size. After returning the first one for a 1/2 size up my son loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! We got them for my son until he was prescribed braces for his legs. His braces won't fit in this type of shoe. :-(
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Manley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves sports and this shoe is easy for him to use with velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My boy didnt like to wear them. They are uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a narrow shoe. It took some time for my kid to adjust to that.
customer_reviews.author: DogMama

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandson. They fit well! He loves these shoes! Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gantt

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son was very pleased with these and they were great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Britany elise

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Insoles began to fall out after only a few months. A little disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: MegMeg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: my little boy goes to shoes like you would not believe. These shoes hold up well they're light they dry quickly and they were decent price and they fit correctly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Williams

customer_reviews.title: They fit great, but there was dirt or glue all over ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a student, so we kept them. They fit great, but there was dirt or glue all over them that we had to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Cargo good.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them, so I’m happy. Little slow logistics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said that it is very comfortable but it simply came apart after 2 days of wearing! The stitching just came apart in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: On smallish, narrow side
customer_reviews.text: It looks real nice but my son said it’s pinching his toes so returning.
customer_reviews.author: Real Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for our two year old
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for our two year old. Bought in Feb and still looking good in May. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: shanna thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the shoes and they seem durable enough. He's been using them for a couple of months now and he runs around quite a bit, and so far the shoes are holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed not even using 2 months it just ripped off ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed not even using 2 months it just ripped off it’s a piece of garbage waste of money highly not recommending anyone to buy it .I wish I can get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amir saleem

customer_reviews.title: ... my grandson so well breathable and wide toe box perfect
customer_reviews.text: They sit my grandson so well breathable and wide toe box perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Calzaretta

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My fiance forgot the Nike's our son is currently in ran small so these are a little big, but not the fault of the shoe company. Really nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Art Zarate Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, they look great, but I can almost guarantee that the velcro will rip as the slots where the velcro tighten are too small, causing the straps and velcro to rip apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes for the price. My son is rough on shoesand these are holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dozier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the snickers. The size is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: sgi

customer_reviews.title: not for kids with fat feet
customer_reviews.text: to narrow of a toe box for my son's feet. quality looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Damerau

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for school
customer_reviews.text: Bought for school, excellent choice for my little runner he is mostly W(Wide) size and fits just perfect on him
customer_reviews.author: Delvis Parra

customer_reviews.title: durable, comfortable shoes, look nice too
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these shoes. sturdy for a kid who destroys shoes fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

product_meta.title: adidas Kids' Altarun Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Built for all sorts of play, these kids' shoes are easy to wear and comfy. The synthetic upper is lightweight and durable, while the non-marking rubber cupsole is perfect for school sports.
feature_bullets: EcoOrtholite sockliner enhances comfort and fit
Synthetic overlays increase support and durability
Mesh upper delivers breathability to keep feet cool
ADIFIT length-nmeasuring tool ensures accurate fit
